content: bring the warmth of fall into your home with our farmhouse mini pumpkin garland crochet pattern this charming design features tiny textured pumpkins in rustic farmhouse fall shades ideal for creating a festive garland this adorable crochet mini pumpkin garland tiny textured pumpkins in cozy autumn hues strung on rustic twine for the perfect mantel or tablescape vibe adapted from my chunky rustic pumpkins it s quick and oh-so-cute whip up these quick-crochet minis using basic stitches thread them onto twine or yarn for a customizable farmhouse-style display level easy size pumpkins approximately 2 garland variable includes detailed steps assembly tips stitch and video tutorials perfect for mantels gifts or party favors
